title: Reading with Randos: A Grief Observed (Part 5)
description:
Sarah, Tripp, and Job continue the reading of C.S. Lewis' "A Grief Observed" where, in this installment, Job is unexpectedly summoned by fire.

The specter of cancer is discussed, as well as palliative care and the benefits, or lack thereof, associated with the relief of suffering for terminal patients.

http://atulgawande.com/book/being-mortal/

Join the ConverZation here:
https://discord.gg/j8ps92H
